alert.note: Alert for Jack; Montague; Wise; Young (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 12:40AM CDT until July 06 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Montague County in north central Texas... Northeastern Young County in north central Texas... Northwestern Wise County in north central Texas... Jack County in north central Texas... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 1237 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bellevue to Windthorst, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bowie, Jacksboro, Nocona, Chico, Bryson, Newport, Fort Richardson State Park, Sunset, Lake Amon G Carter, Lake Bridgeport, Montague, Cundiff, Jermyn, Lost Creek Reservoir, Fruitland, Park Springs, Crafton, Ringgold, Stoneburg and Wizard Wells. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning can kill. Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
